review: This is an amazing piece of technology.  I had it up and running in a matter of minutes.  If Amazon Prime were a little less expensive, I would own it too.
author: James A Mueller

review: WOW!! I have been dying for a smart TV but being that my tv is fairly new I cant buy another one. This product is amazing. There are so may free apps and movie apps that I just love. Seriously, KUNGFu movie app. Drive-In Movie App. Oh and an app for just scary movies...ALL FREE. Initially I had to call amazon because it wasn't working so that was a little frustrating but hang in there if it happens to you.Its definitely worth it.I don't have amazon prime but now I am contemplating getting it just because of all the movie options..
author: jazz

review: Unfortunately the device was not compatible with my TV. However the return service was excellent. I'm giving five stars for excellent follow-through on the service.

review: So glad I bought this!! It's absolutely perfect for my room and I can't wait to take it with me this weekend when I travel to see how it holds up in a hotel.
